attributes.action: My partner is refused a visa who has lived and worked in UK for 10 years
attributes.background: My partner who is a genuine hard working loyal character from America has helped me a lot in my lifeand I cannot thank him enough for changing my life from the moment I saw him 10 years ago to moment  we got engaged  and the present

rejection.details: We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. If you would like the visa rules to be changed, you could start a petition asking for that change to be made.
